form.name: form1

span.strong: The District is in the process of preparing the budget for the upcoming 2020-2021 school year. Please take a few minutes to complete the budget survey questions located at:
The survey will close at 6:00am on April 30, 2020. We will also post the survey on the District’s social media outlets in order to solicit input from parents and the community.
Additionally, Board of Education Budget Study Session information can be found at the following url:
